# Exercise

## Exercise 1 - Linear Algebra

### Ex 1

```{r}

A = matrix(c(4,7,2,5,3,8),2)

B = matrix(c(3,6,-2,9,4,-5),2)

```

a) 
$$ A + B = $$ 
```{r}
A+B 
```

$$ A - B = $$ 
```{r} 
A-B
```


b) 
$$ A' \times A = $$ 
```{r}
t(A)%*%A
```

$$ A \times A' = $$ 
```{r} 
A%*%t(A)
```


### Ex 2

```{r}

A = matrix(c(1,2,3,-1),2)

B = matrix(c(2,1,0,5),2)

```


a) 
$$ A \times B = $$ 
```{r}
A %*% B 
```

$$ B \times A = $$ 
```{r} 
B %*% A
```


b) 
$$ det(A \times B) = $$ 
```{r}
det(A %*% B )
```

$$ det(A) = $$ 
```{r} 
det(A)
```

$$ det(B) = $$ 
```{r} 
det(B)
```
